nodes.text: Phelarion School was an upper-crust school in Lothal's Capital City that was reserved for the sons and daughters of top Imperial officials, wealthy merchants, farming tycoons, and mineral magnates. Its home data node had pictures of attractive youths in black uniforms facing several towers with their backs turned to Lothal's green fields and hills. The school's data node had a roster of students that could be accessed on a datapad. During the Transportation Ministry data breach, Merei Spanjaf impersonated a pupil named Kinera Tiree in order to plant snoopers at the Transportation Ministry's headquarters in Capital City.
